amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to transfer or release any individual detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba to the individual's country of origin or to any other foreign country.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cotton amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 184 (Roll no. 323).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cotton amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 230 - 184 (Roll no. 323).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Cotton.
